}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:PN series.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCN9074 ([https://www.524wifi.com/index.php/wifi6-module/ ''Pine'' series module]) *M.2 E Key interface with PCIe 3.0, JTAG/UART connector *5GHz max 24dBm output power (per chain), up to 4804Mbps *4x spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO)
===Purchase Sample=== [https://www.shop.compex.com.sg/product-page/pn02-1 Compex System Sample Store]
==See also== :;[[Compex]] • [https://compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/skype_picture_2020_05_13t07_29_25_064z.jpeg ''Pine'' series] *[[Compex PN01.1]] • QCN9024 *[[Compex PN02.1]] • QCN9074 *[[Compex PN02.3]] • QCN9074 *[[Compex PN02.6]] • QCN9074 *[[Compex PN02.7]] • QCN9074
